title: Disruptive tech – Far-reaching changes that have further to go - Investors' Corner - Investors' Corner BNP Paribas
content: Disruptive tech – Far-reaching changes that have further to go - Investors' Corner  Investors' Corner BNP Paribas
description: It is unlikely that the extensive changes in how we work, consume and communicate will be reversed. What does this mean for the outlook for disruptive tech?
